data.comment: The match has started.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 2, Ball safe as Brestois is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Johann Hamel awards the away team a throw-in.
Brestois awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 4, Throw-in for Brestois in their own half.
Throw-in Brestois.
Monaco to take a throw-in in Brestois territory.
In the minute 5, Can Monaco get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Brestois's half?
Johann Hamel signals a Monaco throw-in in Brestois's half.
Brestois awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 6, Free kick for Monaco in the half of Brestois.
At Stade Francis-Le Ble, Haris Belkebla has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Monaco's Wissam Ben Yedder breaks free at Stade Francis-Le Ble. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 8, Johann Hamel awards Brestois a goal kick.
Goal! The home team take a 1-0 lead through Romain Faivre.
Brestois's Steve Mounie gets in a shot on goal at Stade Francis-Le Ble. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 10, Throw-in for Brestois close to the penalty box.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Brestois close to the penalty box.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Brest.
In the minute 12, Johann Hamel signals a free kick to Monaco in their own half.
Monaco's Gelson Martins gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Brestois at Stade Francis-Le Ble.
In the minute 14, Throw-in for Monaco at Stade Francis-Le Ble.
Throw-in for Brestois in the half of Monaco.
Throw-in Brestois.
In the minute 17, Ball safe as Brestois is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Brestois in their own half.
Johann Hamel awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 20, Throw-in for Monaco in their own half.
Throw-in for Monaco in the half of Brestois.
Can Monaco get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Brestois's half?
In the minute 23, Free kick for Brestois in their own half.
Brestois awarded a free kick in their own half.
Johann Hamel signals a Monaco throw-in in Brestois's half.
In the minute 29, Can Monaco capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Brestois's half?
Johann Hamel signals a free kick to Brestois in their own half.
Corner awarded to Monaco.
In the minute 32, Sofiane Diop (Monaco) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Johann Hamel signals a free kick to Monaco in their own half.
In Brest Monaco attack through Cesc Fabregas. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 35, Ball goes out of play for a Brestois goal kick.
In Brest a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Monaco awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 36, Monaco pushes forward through Gelson Martins, whose finish on goal is saved.
Wissam Ben Yedder (Monaco) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Gelson Martins (Monaco) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 38, Monaco have been awarded a corner by Johann Hamel.
Corner awarded to Monaco.
Monaco's Sofiane Diop misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 39, Brestois have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Brestois at Stade Francis-Le Ble.
Monaco awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 40, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Monaco awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Brestois at Stade Francis-Le Ble.
In the minute 44, Free kick in a good position for Monaco!
Monaco drive upfield and Wissam Ben Yedder gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Brestois defender.
Giulian Biancone for Monaco gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 45, Brestois have a goal kick.
The 1st half is prolonged by 1 minutes of added time.
Johann Hamel awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 45, Brestois advance rapidly upfield but Johann Hamel blows for offside.
The first-half is over at Stade Francis-Le Ble.
The second-half has just kicked-off.
In the minute 46, Ball safe as Monaco is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Brestois will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Monaco.
Monaco are coming forward and Gelson Martins gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 48, It's a goal kick for the home team in Brest.
Free kick Brestois.
Johann Hamel signals a free kick to Brestois.
In the minute 50, Gaetan Charbonnier of Brestois smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Monaco make their first substitution with Florentino Luis replacing Youssouf Fofana.
Monaco to take a throw-in in Brestois territory.
In the minute 52, Free kick for Brestois in the half of Monaco.
Kevin Volland (Monaco) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Can Brestois get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Monaco's half?
In the minute 54, Monaco needs to be cautious. Brestois have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in for Monaco in their own half.
Monaco surge into the attack at Stade Francis-Le Ble but Ruben Aguilarâ€™s header is off-target.
In the minute 56, Goal kick for Brestois at Stade Francis-Le Ble.
Brestois to take a throw-in in Monaco territory.
Throw-in Brestois.
In the minute 59, Throw-in for Brestois in their own half.
Important block from the Brestois defence as Ruben Aguilar fires in a strike for Monaco.
Monaco have been awarded a corner by Johann Hamel.
In the minute 60, Sofiane Diop of Monaco gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Brestois goal kick.
Monaco drives forward and Sofiane Diop gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 62, Corner awarded to Monaco.
Ball safe as Monaco is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Johann Hamel awards Brestois a goal kick.
In the minute 65, The away team have replaced Wissam Ben Yedder with Stevan Jovetic. This is the second substitution made today by Niko Kovac.
Enzo Millot is on a sub for Cesc Fabregas for Monaco.
Johann Hamel awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 67, Throw-in Monaco.
Free kick for Brestois in their own half.
Johann Hamel signals a free kick to Monaco in their own half.
In the minute 68, Steve Mounie (Brestois) has received a yellow card from Johann Hamel.
Free kick for Brestois in their own half.
Monaco have been awarded a corner by Johann Hamel.
In the minute 70, Monaco's Benoit Badiashile attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Johann Hamel awards Brestois a goal kick.
Brestois awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 72, Monaco's Stevan Jovetic breaks free at Stade Francis-Le Ble. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Brestois at Stade Francis-Le Ble.
Giulian Biancone for Monaco has been booked by Johann Hamel and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 74, Can Monaco capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Pietro Pellegri is replacing Kevin Volland for the away team.
Niko Kovac is making the team's fifth substitution at Stade Francis-Le Ble with Willem Geubbels replacing Giulian Biancone.
In the minute 75, Chrislain Matsima (Monaco) gets in a header on goal but the attempt is cleared.
Romain Perraud gets his shot on target but fails to score for Brestois.
Brestois have been awarded a corner by Johann Hamel.
In the minute 76, Johann Hamel signals a free kick to Monaco.
Brestois's Paul Lasne has been booked in Brest.
Monaco push forward at Stade Francis-Le Ble and Stevan Jovetic gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Brestois defence.
In the minute 78, Throw-in high up the field for Monaco in Brest.
Monaco have a dangerous throw-in.
Johann Hamel signals a throw-in for Monaco, close to Brestois's area.
In the minute 79, Johann Hamel signals a free kick to Brestois in their own half.
Franck Honorat is replacing Gaetan Charbonnier for Brestois at Stade Francis-Le Ble.
Monaco awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 80, Throw-in for Brestois at Stade Francis-Le Ble.
In Brest, Stevan Jovetic of Monaco is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Corner awarded to Monaco.
In the minute 81, Brestois awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Monaco in the half of Brestois.
Stevan Jovetic (Monaco) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
In the minute 83, Brestois have a goal kick.
Johann Hamel signals a Monaco throw-in in Brestois's half.
In Brest a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 84, Chrislain Matsima (Monaco) gets a yellow card.
Monaco have been awarded a corner by Johann Hamel.
Johann Hamel awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 88, Free kick for Brestois in their own half.
Throw-in for Monaco at Stade Francis-Le Ble.
The home team replace Jeremy Le Douaron with Hugo Magnetti.
In the minute 89, Free kick Monaco.
Monaco's Benoit Badiashile misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Brestois goal kick.
2 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in Brestois.
Can Monaco get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Brestois's half?
Ball safe as Monaco is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Monaco to take a throw-in in Brestois territory.
The match is over. Final score 1-0.
